name: ALDEN O CLASS MK II

images.alt: Alden O MkII photo on sailboatdata.com
Alden O Class MK II drawing on sailboatdata.com

basics.builder: Graves Yacht Yard / George Chaisson / others

notes:
Alden design # 188. 
This second version of the ALDEN O proved to be far more popular than the first and, at last report (2006), some are still racing today at St. Regis Lake in the Adirondacks (NY, USA).
